tool_description: Retrieves current and historical portfolio holdings data including asset allocations, quantities, and timestamps for portfolio performance analysis.

portfolio_id.description: Unique identifier for the portfolio to analyze

error_messages: Portfolio not found: The provided portfolio_id does not exist in the system. Verify the correct portfolio identifier.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Future date error: as_of_date cannot be in the future. Use current or historical dates only.
Data unavailable: Portfolio data is not available for the specified date. Try a more recent date.
usage: Provide a valid portfolio_id and as_of_date to retrieve portfolio holdings. The tool returns detailed asset allocations and metadata for the specified date.

total_value.description: Total portfolio value in base currency

asset_symbols.description: Array of ticker symbols held in portfolio

quantities.description: Array of quantities for each asset (same order as symbols)

market_values.description: Array of market values for each position
